Understate: The claim may understate the level of security in the election by using the word "probably" when stating it was the most secure election.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support as it only quotes one source, the Department of Homeland Security, without providing additional evidence or data.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the statement from the Department of Homeland Security represents the views of all top cybersecurity experts, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests that some top cybersecurity experts disagree with President Trump, implying there is an alternative explanation to his claims of fraud.
